text: James David Rodríguez Rubio, known as James Rodriguez (born 12 July 1991), is a Colombian football midfielder. He currently plays for the Colombia national team and is currently a free agent. Because of his performances at the 2014 FIFA World Cup, he is often known as one of the world's best young players. == Career statistics == === Club === Club Season League League League Cup Cup Cup International International International Other Other Other Total Total Total Club Season Apps Gls.
